"Remind me to always stay true to myself and not let anyone else define who I am."
"Give me advice on how to handle difficult situations and maintain a positive outlook."
"Tell me about the most important lessons you've learned in life and how they've shaped you into the person you are today."
"Encourage me to take risks and not be afraid of failure, as it's a crucial part of personal growth."
"Remind me to cherish the relationships I have with my loved ones and not take them for granted."
